cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
It goes off-road, through wars, and has no doors . It is worth every cent.
It's owned by Ben Conner...NOUGH SAID
This magnificent machine was created by Charles Rolls and Henry Royce. It is one of six made and has a top speed of 39 mph (man that's fast).
